selected_quotes: Cannabinoids could help patients recover from coma and traumatic brain injury
Cannabinoid agonist associated to early survival in TBI coma. #neurosurgery #neurology

citation.abstract: BACKGROUND AND STUDY OBJECT: Despite many drug trials, no substance has yet been identified that improves the outcome of severe head injury. The dual cannabinoid CB1/CB2 receptor agonist KN38-7271 mediates potent neuroprotection in animal models. We describe here the first randomized, double-blind, prospective, placebo-controlled clinical phase IIa proof-of-concept trial to investigate the safety, pharmacokinetics, and potential efficacy of a cannabinoid receptor agonist in humans.
citation.journal: Journal of Neurological Surgery Part A: Central European Neurosugery
citation.title: Early Survival of Comatose Patients after Severe Traumatic Brain Injury with the Dual Cannabinoid CB1/CB2 Receptor Agonist KN38-7271: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Phase II Trial

author.name: Bernardo de Andrada
